description: This file defines a REST controller named SmokeController in a Java Spring Boot application. It provides a simple endpoint /api/smoke used as a health check or smoke test to verify that the application is running.

classes.name: SmokeController
classes.description: A REST controller providing a health check endpoint to verify the application is running.

methods.name: smoke
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /api/smoke and returns a simple confirmation message.
